# Available Commands
The possible commands in Balatro are all composed of a single word specifying the action, followed by any necessary positional arguments, which are lists of integers.
Note: all position arguments are 1-indexed.

The following commands are available in your current game state.
use_consumable <consumeable_position> <target_card_position1> <target_card_position2> ... <target_card_positionN> - Use a consumeable from the consumeables section. The first position argument is the position within your consumables inventory of the consumable you'd like to use. Subsequent position arguments specify the cards in hand that the consumeable will be used on, if that consumeable requires targets.
sell_consumable <consumeable_position> - Sell a consumeable from the consumeables section.
rearrange_jokers <joker1> <joker2> ... <jokerN> - Rearrange the list of currently owned jokers. Every index in the list of current jokers must be present, i.e. if there are 5 jokers, the indices 1-5 must be present.
sell_joker <joker_position> - Sell a joker from the jokers section.
buy_card <card_position> - Buy a card from the card section. Individual Joker cards are also bought from the card section.
buy_booster <booster_pack_position> - Buy a booster pack from the booster pack section.
buy_voucher <voucher_position> - Buy a voucher from the voucher section.
buy_and_use_consumable <consumable_position> - Buy a consumable type card (Tarot, Planet, Spectral) from the card section and use it immediately. Cannot do this if the consumable requires target hand cards.
round_select - Finish shopping and go to the round select screen.
reroll_shop - Spends the reroll cost to reroll the cards section of the shop.

**Ante 8 Shop Analysis**

Okay, here's the situation. It's Ante 8, Shop phase, and the goal is to maximize my score for these final blinds. I'm running a Three of a Kind strategy, which I've got at Level 4, so I'm looking at 90 chips and 9 mult as a base.

I have a solid Joker setup already: Juggler for hand size, Wily Joker for chips, Shoot the Moon (Holo) for a chunk of base mult and Queen scaling, Half Joker for more flat mult, Card Sharp for a multiplier, and Chicot for another multiplier, plus boss disable. All six slots are full, so no space for new jokers. I also have "The Lovers" consumable, which doesn't affect the shop.

Looking at the shop, I have $4 to spend. Justice, a Glass card upgrade, is tempting at $3. It's strong to double the mult on a core card, but since I can't target cards in hand right now, it is not useful at the moment, and I'd need an empty consumable slot (1/2 is filled, which I could use to purchase it). I could buy and use Justice, but there's no way to use it immediately, since I can't target cards.

The other option is the Arcana Pack for $4, which gives me a choice of Tarot cards. That could be *huge* for deck fixing; Strength to get more of the same rank for my 3OAK, Death to copy a Queen or a high card, or even some extra mult.

I've already optimized the Joker order as: Juggler, Wily, Shoot the Moon, Half Joker, Card Sharp, and Chicot. The additive mult (+Mult) Jokers are before the multiplicative mult (X Mult) Jokers, and Shoot the Moon's Holo bonus works left-to-right. This is ideal, as the order affects the scoring calculations!

I have $4, and the Arcana Pack costs $4. Given that it's Ante 8, I want the most impactful consumable. An Arcana pack choice is usually better than a single Justice card. This is a no-brainer: it's Arcana Pack time. Let's do this. I'm selecting the Arcana Pack, position 1.
